enhancedtooltips.title: EnhancedTooltips Config
enhancedtooltips.config.itemBadges.desc: Shows the category of an item in a badge on its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.rarityTooltip.de: Shows the rarity of an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.effectTooltip.de: Shows a list of effects applied on consuming an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.armorTooltip.des: Shows a preview of the armor piece on an armor stand.
enhancedtooltips.config.bucketTooltip.de: Shows a preview of the bucket entity in a bucket.
Shows a preview of the spawn egg entity.
enhancedtooltips.config.durabilityToolti: Shows the durability of an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.screen.warn: Â§cBEnhancedTooltips is unable to display a configuration screen because YetAnotherConfigLib mod is not installed. Please use the configuration file instead. Sorry for the inconvenience!
